New Records: CJ McCollum tied a career high with 50 points, and the Pelicans tied a season high with 18 made 3s
Key Match Events: Jordan Poole was affected by a hard fall under the basket and scored just five more points after the fall
A moment of silence was held before tipoff due to a deadly New Year’s Day attack in the French Quarter
Pre-Game Insights: The Pelicans were playing at home for the first time since a deadly New Year’s Day attack in the French Quarter
Post-Match Reflections: The Pelicans snapped an 11-game losing streak with a 132-120 victory over the Wizards
New Orleans benefitted from the return from injury of reserve guard Jose Alvarado
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Wizards scored a season-high 72 points in the paint
The Pelicans have the NBA's worst record at 6-29, but now share with Washington (6-26) the dubious distinction of having the fewest victories in the league
Others: Jose Alvarado contributed 5 points, 3 assists, and 3 steals in 20 minutes after missing 23 games
Russell Wilson is mitigating cause for concern surrounding WR George Pickens, who has struggled mightily these final few weeks
